description:
the vedic Sanskrit ITRANS does not work as expected on ubuntu 22.04
shrI entered from keyboard displays सशश्ररी instead of expected श्री
not sure what and where the problem is
I will type faster than past!

This is by far the best app for making it easy to type in less supported languages around the world. I have been using it for years. I would give it a 5start review except for one problem in Ubuntu 20.04.

One small problem is that that as of Sept 23, 2020 some lesser know languages weren't appearing in the ibus list of languages (under Region & Language Settings) in Ubuntu 20.04. The solution is simple. Just open a terminal and do:
sudo apt-get install ibus-keyman
reinstall your keyboard in Keyman and reboot
Now when you return to settings, if you scroll down the list of languages and click on "other" your language will show up in the new list and you can choose it.
summary: The best app for typing in languages with hard to access characters
